title: How to make my 2-year-old a future famous singer - Quora

response.answer_text: You can’t. And you shouldn’t try to live out your dreams through them. You can give them the opportunities and encouragement to sing and to develop their voice, but to become more than a good singer requires them adopt it as their ambition, and to have the vocal abilities in the first place. To become a famous singer requires some ability, the drive and a lot of luck - even if you have all the contacts, and can afford to support them in the process. Millions of extremely talented singers never make it because their look or their sound are ‘not right’ for the market at the time. Hundreds, if not thousands, of children of the rich and famous have made one album which sank with barely a ripple following more than the usual amount of publicity for the debut single

i have a son who is a musical savant. just expose your child to various genres of music. the actual vocal coaching should begin when the child reaches five or six. right now font pressure your kid. just let the child develope. anyway my son has several vocal coaches. music is all we do.
